description: Poutine's cousin from the USA, disco chips are loaded with gravy and cheese. A moreish snack to serve at your next gathering.
keywords: Chips & fries,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Christmas leftovers,Sesame free,Easter leftovers,Potato,Soy free,Leftovers,Peanut free
name: Disco Chips Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 120g havarti cheese, chopped or coarsely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Cut potatoes into long 1.5cm-thick chips. Pat dry with a clean tea towel. Heat oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Test by dropping one chip into the oil; it should sizzle immediately.

Line an oven tray with a paper towel and place a wire rack on top. Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Cook chips in oil in 3-4 batches, for 7-8 minutes each batch, until crisp and golden (see tip). Using a slotted spoon, transfer them to the rack and keep warm in the oven. Repeat with remaining chips, ensuring the oil has reheated sufficiently between each batch.
Top chips with cheese and return to the oven for 3 minutes until cheese has softened. Meanwhile, heat the gravy, pour over chips and serve immediately.
